text: St. John's University is a private, coeducational, Roman Catholic university in Queens, New York. The university has about 20,069 students. It was founded in 1870. The current president of the university is Brian Shanley. There is also a campus in Paris, France and Rome, Italy. ==Sports== The athletics teams of the university are called the Red Storm. They have 17 varsity teams and they compete in the Big East Conference. ==Other websites== *St. John's University's Official website *St. John's Red Storm's Official athletics website Category:Big East Conference Category:Colleges and universities in New York City Category:1870 establishments in New York (state)
title: St. John's University (New York City)
